bibl.title: Between State and Steppe: New Evidence for Society in Sixth-century Southern Transjordan.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Michigan. Summary in DA 62 (2001-2002) p. 2208-A. - Uses new testimony from the Petra papyri.
CALDWELL Robert Chrisman, Between State and Steppe: New Evidence for Society in Sixth-century Southern Transjordan.
